title: Heavy discounts on Honor smartphones during Flipkart’s ‘Big Billion Day’ Sale
text:
Honor, Huawei’s smartphone e-brand for digital natives, today announced heavy discounts on Honor products as part of the Flipkart ‘Big Billion Day’ sale festival. The discounts on the Honor smartphones can be availed between 15th October to 17th October. The discounts are applicable on latest smartphones including the recently launched Honor 7 and others like Honor 6 Plus, Honor 6, Honor Holly, Honor 4X, Honor 4C and Honor Bee smartphones.
Honor 6 Plus will be available for just Rs.23,499 instead of the regular price of Rs.26,499. There will also be exchange offers upto Rs.10,000 along with 10% discount when paid with selected bank cards.
Honor 6 is one of the few smartphones to offer 3GB RAM under Rs.15,000 price range. During the Big Billion Day Sale, the device will be available at Rs.2,000 cheaper making it a perfect deal at just Rs.12,999. Along with the discount, there will also be an exchange offer upto Rs.6,000.
Honor 4X is the company’s best-selling device which is priced at Rs.9,999 and offers decent mid-range specifications. It will be available with a discount of Rs.1,100 and exchange offers upto Rs.4,000.
Honor 4C will be available at a discounted price of Rs.7,799 making it one of the most affordable smartphones with a 13MP camera. It also comes with additional 10% discount when paid through selected bank cards.
Honor Holly is priced at just Rs.5,999 ad comes with HD display, 16GB of storage and other entry-level specifications. During the Big Billion Day sale, it will be available at just Rs.5,400 along with additional Rs.2,000 off on exchange.
Honor Bee was launched at a price of Rs.4,499 and includes 1GB of RAM and an 8MP Camera. Now the company offers Rs.500 additional discount which makes the device cost only Rs.3,999. There will be another 10% discount when you paid through selected bank cards.
The company is also extending offers of up to Rs. 14,000 from its associated Honor league partners like Hungama, FreeCharge, CouponDunia, Yatra and Cliques. To avail the offer from the league partners, users simply have to install the applications from Google Play Store on their Honor smartphone.
The latest addition to the Honor family, the Honor 7 will be available in two colours – Mystery Gray and Fantasy Silver at the retail price of Rs. 22,999. Available from 00:00 hours, starting 15th October, 2015 till midnight of October 15, 2015, the Honor 7’s fully metallic body is air-brushed with a ceramic coating, offering an unmistakably premium finish. The device’s 5.2-inch encasing and carefully positioned buttons and sensors allows for an ergonomic single-handed operation like never before.
(With PR newswire inputs)
 14, 2015 2:32 pm
